The background shows green grass and trees. The scissors are clearly visible in his left hand, and he appears to be preparing to cut the bag of Mentos candies with them. This action aligns with the description in Option C. There is no indication of any other tools or actions like tightening a bolt, slicing a cake, or writing a note, which eliminates Options A, B, and D. </think>
